item.title: US-based: Make 1-3 Minute Video Reviews of Your Amazon Purchases - Upwork
item.description:
US-based consumers with an iPhone/Android and an Amazon account:

I want to pay you to make 1 - 3 minute review videos of purchases / items you have ALREADY bought from Amazon :) All I need is the video and a single image of the item for the video thumbnail.

Considering the length of the videos (they shouldn't take you more than a few minutes each max),I pay between $3-$5 per video depending on product category. If you can do 10/hour, that can be $30/hour or more.

These will be items you have already purchased yourself from Amazon, that we will agree on together before you get started. Your task will then just be to film a simple, quick, and honest review video on your iPHone or smartphone (with specific guidelines), take a quick photo of the item for the video thumbnail, and send them to me for my review.  You do NOT need to do any video editing, trimming, etc. Raw, honest, quick videos.

I will show you examples of what I want so there is no confusion and give you guidelines.

Budget: $30
